posts.post_content:
I have the folowing Chase 206's For Sale. Scans available on request. Paypal, check or money order. Thanks. Dennis.
Chase Pink Portrait SGC 20 Piedmont 350-$40
Chase White Cap SGC 30 Piedmont 150-$35
Chase Dark Cap SGC 30 Piedmont 150-$35
If you ask or scans please get back to me once you have recieved them I feel like this is just common courtesy. Thanks.

I will take all (3) cards.  I have sent both PM and email.  I emailed minutes after your post earlier in the week and did not get a response so please ensure you're receiving my messages.

thanks
[url]ppgustafson@yahoo.com[/url]
